divs: Sighting DetailsThe owner of a recreational facility was checking on the property. He observed abright white light in the distance. A box-shaped object (estimated footballfield proportions) approached and passed into the distance on a straight line,moving slower than a conventional aircraft. Large, horizontally allignedrectangular "windows" along the sides emitted intense white light. Smaller,vertical windows were closely spaced on the rear. Many small, steady red lightsformed a rounded square pattern on the underside. At its closest, the object wasperhaps half a mile distance and 500 feet above the ground. It accelerated as itmoved into the distance. No sound was heard. Duration was estimated as 5minutes.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Highland
There were no other sightings in Highland on or around January 5th 2000
